lead_paragraph: O'CONNOR--Julia Sturges, 90, of Bronxville and Shelter Island, NY, died peacefully in hospice care at Lawrence Hospital in Bronxville on April 12, 2016. Predeceased by her husband of nearly 65 years, Robert H. O'Connor, she is survived by her sister Cary S. Burns; children Sandra O'Connor, Russell O'Connor, and Linda Casertano; sons-in-law Edwin Hydeman and Drew Casertano; grandsons Alexander (Renee) Casertano, Tyler (Annie) Casertano, and William Casertano; and great-grandson McCauley Casertano. Her brother Perry MacKay Sturges Jr. predeceased her. A daughter of Perry MacKay Sturges and Julia Green Sturges, she grew up in Princeton, NJ, attended Miss Fine's School and Milton Academy, and graduated from Sarah Lawrence College in 1948. Funeral service Saturday, April 30, at 1:00pm at Christ Church, Bronxville. In lieu of flowers, memorial contributions may be made to New York-Presbyterian/ Lawrence Hospital, Development Dept., 55 Palmer Avenue PH4, Bronxville, NY 10708; Christ Church, 17 Sagamore Road, Bronxville, NY 10708; or St. Mary's Episcopal Church, P.O. Box 1660, Shelter Island, NY 11964. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  O'CONNOR, JULIA STURGES
